name: 陳信安
objective: This course is to introduce elementary topics about Crystallography in materials science.
schedule:
1. Crystal
2. Bravais lattice
3. Point group and space group
4. Diffraction
5. Geometry and intensity
6. Structure determination
7. Other related topic
materials:
(Optional)
Elements of X-ray Diffraction, B. D. Cullity and S. R. Stock
Essentials of Crystallography, Duncan McKie and Christine McKie
Crystallography - An Introduction, Walter Borchardt-Ott
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
